oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Copy print of Confederate veteran Reuben Columbus Camp
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pvt. R. C. Camp served in the 3rd Tenn. Cav. Rgt., Forrest's Cavalry and was captured by Gen. Stephen Hurlburt's command on March 1, 1863 at Decatur (Ala." He was confined at Camp Douglas prison camp in Chicago, Ill. and paroled in May 15, 1863 and delivered to City Point, Va. for prisoner exchange.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Reuben Columbus Camp
